questionTitle: How many types of security boundary values exist in Cloud Cube model?
questionExplanation: There are two types depending upon network firewall.

questionOption1: A deployment model defines the purpose of the cloud and the nature of how the cloud is located
questionOption2: Service model defines the purpose of the cloud and the nature of how the cloud is located
questionOption3: Cloud Square Model is meant to show is that the traditional notion of a network boundary being the networkâ€™s firewall no longer applies in cloud computing
questionExplanation: Four types of deployment models exist.

questionTitle: Which of the following is provided by ownership dimension of Cloud Cube Model?
__________ is a measure of whether the operation is inside or outside the security boundary or network firewall.

questionOption1: Public cloud may be managed by the constituent organization(s) or by a third party
questionOption2: A community cloud may be managed by the constituent organization(s) or by a third party
questionOption3: Private clouds may be either on- or off-premises
questionExplanation: The public cloud infrastructure is available for public use alternatively for a large industry group.

questionTitle: Which of the following is related to the service provided by Cloud?
questionExplanation: Insourced or Outsourced means whether the service is provided by the customer or the service provider.

questionTitle: ________ dimension corresponds to two different states in the eight possible cloud forms.
questionExplanation: The sourcing dimension addresses the deliverer of the service.

questionTitle: The ________ cloud infrastructure is operated for the exclusive use of an organization.
questionExplanation: The cloud may be managed by that organization or a third party.

questionTitle: __________ cloud is one where the cloud has been organized to serve a common function or purpose.
questionExplanation: A community cloud may be managed by the constituent organization(s) or by a third party.

questionTitle: A hybrid cloud combines multiple clouds where those clouds retain their unique identities but are bound together as a unit.
questionExplanation: A hybrid cloud may offer standardized or proprietary access to data and applications, as well as application portability.
